amendment.description: To require reporting regarding telework by employees of agencies funded under the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1177 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1177 proposed by Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5247-5249) To require reporting regarding telework by employees of agencies funded under the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1177 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1177 proposed by Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1092.
